*hugs* I might not remember because I was so young... but a similar thing happened to me when I was an infant, so I'm still glad to be alive. I nearly choked to death on [spoiler]my mother's amniotic fluids.[/spoiler] Disgusting, I know, but it's the truth.

topics.body: I think the worst I ever got was choking on a cherry tomato. I decided to get stupid and see if I could swallow one whole. That shit got lodged in my throat. My step-dad pretty much had to punch me in the sternum to get it out.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5537d76f63687269e5910700#post_5537d76f63687269e5910700
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5537d6396368721fec880b00#post_5537d6396368721fec880b00
I was taking a nap and I woke up choking like hell was having a party in my mouth, Satan was there, Hitler was there, and they just got done using the fucking bathroom after a night of Mexican. 

I was gaging, crying, and I couldn't breath for probably 10 seconds to a minute. 

It felt awful. 

[/bq]
Don't do that >:I
If you die I'm going to kick your ass
You my bro

^and while we're getting all emotional and shit I guess I should say you guys are important to me too since I currently have the social life of a barnacle and having someone to talk to every day is really nice and you're helping me slowly get out of the 21 year slump I've been in^


^Or whatever^
